description: Manage Azure Network Virtual Appliance Connection.

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance connection list
examples: az network virtual-appliance connection list --nva  MyNVA -g MyRG

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance connection show
commands.summary: Get the details of specified NVA connection.
examples: az network virtual-appliance connection show -n defaultConnection --nva  MyNVA -g MyRG

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance connection update
commands.summary: Update existing connection to Network Virtual Appliance.
commands.syntax:
az network virtual-appliance connection update [--add]
                                               [--associated-route-table]
                                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--inbound-route-map]
                                               [--labels]
                                               [--name]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--nva]
                                               [--outbound-route-map]
                                               [--propagated]
                                               [--remove]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--set]
                                               [--subscription]
examples: az network virtual-appliance connection update --name defaultConnection  --nva MyNva -g MyRG --subscription <subId> --associated-route-table "{'id': '/subscriptions/<subId>/resourceGroups/<MyRG>/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualHubs/<vhubName>/hubRouteTables/<customRouteTable>'}"
az network virtual-appliance connection update --name defaultConnection  --nva MyNva -g MyRG --subscription <subId>  --labels [label1,label2]
az network virtual-appliance connection update --name defaultConnection  --nva MyNva -g MyRG --subscription <subId>   --propagated "[{'id':'<routeTable1id>'},{'id':'<routeTable2id>'}]"

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance connection wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
